title: Simply Perfect Sunday No. 8 Warm 16 ounce Hand or Body Lotion
description: This amazing hand/body lotion are light weight and glide on smoothly. They absorb quickly and leave the skin moist and fragranced for hours on end. The secret is a blend of Refined Shea Butter and Aloe Vera. They are paraben free and Made in America.
